Date: Wednesday, 2/12/1985
Subject: Contract offer
Please decrease the number of years in your
offer, otherwise I won't be interested at all!

Regards,
Gerard Morazan

Regards,
Chase Morris

Date: Thursday, 4/10/1985
Subject: James Webb failed learning new position
James Webb doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director

That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director
